description:
Charming and Unique 1 bed in the heart of West Village with rare, private outdoor terrace for relaxing and unwinding after a busy day in the city! 
Sun-soaked bedroom! Surrounded by the best bars and restaurants in the city. Live like a local New Yorker!

My apartment is located in the heart of West Village! You will be surrounded by all of the best restaurants that the city has to offer. If you are looking for a place to live like a New Yorker, this is the spot for you! Local bakeries, boutique clothing stores, quaint brunch locales, etc.

I am available for any questions or concerns during your stay!

The West Village looks like a European small town in the middle of the nation’s biggest city. Don’t be fooled by this neighborhood’s quaint storefronts and their equally adorable names—the West Village is a fast-paced place. Shoppers, diners, and art aficionados flock here in droves. Despite its foot-traffic, the West Village manages to maintain an intimate vibe that sets it apart from many other hustle-bustle New York City destinations.

Less than a 5min walk to 1 ,2, A,C,E & B,D,F,M trains.
6 minute walk to Washington Square Park & NYU.
name: Unique West Village 1 Bed w/Charming Private Patio
